item.title: Names of |han≠kass'o's relations
item.summary: The names of some Bushmen. (L VIII.-13. 7195 rev.). Names of some of |han≠kass'o's relations.
item.comments: 1) This story is largely untranslated, but it seems to be a list of names of people related to the narrator, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-13
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: the names of some of |han≠kass'o's relations
